message: Elena - LAUNCH COORDINATION REQUIRED: I need you to coordinate the complete launch workflow based on your analysis. Start with WEEK 1 FOUNDATION tasks: 1) Zara: Authentication + subscription system 2) Aria: Workspace UI/UX design 3) Ava: Maya-Victoria integration workflows 4) Olga: Database structure + file organization. Please coordinate these agents to implement the TRAIN → STYLE → PHOTOSHOOT → BUILD user journey immediately. This is launch critical - coordinate ALL agents to execute now.
